text: Shobha Rani Tripura is a Bangladeshi teacher and writer. She received Begum Rokeya Padak in 2017. ==Biography== Shobha Rani Tripura was born on 2 February 1959 in Rangamati. She has written numerous books on hill people. She has written short stories, novels and plays too. She was the headmistress of Choungrachharhi Government Primary School. Shobha Rani Tripura married Mongsen Ching Monsin in 1984. He received Ekushey Padak in 2016. They had two daughters. Shobha Rani Tripura received Begum Rokeya Padak in 2017. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:People from Rangamati District Category:Recipients of Begum Rokeya Padak Category:Bangladeshi women writers Category:Bangladeshi academics
